pages.text: Wildwood trees are extinct in these lands, and all that remains of them are their tattered wildroots, although $(info) $(l:rituals/ritual_wild_growth)certain rituals$() are able to rejuvenate these roots and sprout forth a single tree.
The bark of the wildwood tree is also used in spells and rituals.
$(info) In ancient times these saplings were a common sight, but nowadays one must search ancient crypts and deserted market stalls in the hopes of finding one.
$(info) Unlike normal trees, the leaves of the wildwood tree drop wildroot instead of saplings.
